itemDescription: Scottish Glaswegian landscape and portrait painter and Director of Glasgow School of Art, lived 1860-1924

wikipedia_page.main: John Henderson (1860-1924) was a Scottish  Glaswegian landscape and portrait painter and Director of Glasgow School of Art
